synopsis.text:
Anjou, Kiba, and Shindou - three individuals with distinct backgrounds and aspirations, find their lives intertwined in the world of Cardfight!! Vanguard. Chrono Shindou, a self-reliant orphan, crosses paths with the charismatic and popular fencer, Shion Kiba, and the intelligent and alluring Tokyoite, Tokoha Anjou. The catalyst for their connection? A mysterious deck known as 'Gear Chronicle,' which lands in Chrono's hands and sets the stage for a new chapter in their lives.

As they progress to their respective high schools, the trio, once united as Team TRY3, now form their own teams in pursuit of their individual destinies. This new path leads them to rival one another in the highly anticipated U20 Championship. In this large-scale tournament, the stakes are high, and the bonds they once shared will be tested.

Prepare for a tale of ambition, camaraderie, and competition as these three protagonists navigate the thrilling world of Cardfight!! Vanguard. Will their shared history bring them together or drive them further apart in their quest for victory? Only time will tell.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
